								Home
								



			
					
				Business Services Website Template incl. CMS			
					
		
		
	
Business Services Website Template incl. CMSOur expert software development services turn your ideas into reality by providing ready-made solutions tailored to your business needs from concept to deployment—great business Services website Template including a content management system.
The user dashboard includes features such as an order list, deposit management, transaction history, support ticketing, subscription plans, and service management, offering users comprehensive control over their activities.
The admin dashboard facilitates efficient management with tools for viewing user and subscriber lists, managing plans and services, showcasing a portfolio, processing orders, overseeing deposits and transactions, and managing notifications. This integration ensures streamlined operations and enhanced user satisfaction, making our software development services a valuable asset for your business.


Let's StartSubscriber & Portfolio









The Subscriber module is designed to handle all aspects of user subscriptions. It tracks the start and end dates of each subscription, the specific plan each user has selected, and the current payment status. This module also categorizes subscribers based on their chosen plans, facilitating targeted communications and personalized services. Furthermore, it manages subscription renewals and cancellations efficiently.
The Portfolio module highlights the agency’s projects and achievements. It features sections for completed projects, client feedback, and case studies. Each entry in the portfolio is detailed with descriptions, images, and videos. This module showcases the agency’s expertise and successful outcomes, thereby enhancing credibility and attracting new clients. Administrators can easily add new projects and update existing entries to keep the portfolio current.











Let's OnboardServices & PlansThe Plans module manages the various service plans offered by the agency. It includes tools for creating, updating, and deleting plans. Each plan is detailed with features, pricing, duration, and any special terms and conditions. This module organizes and categorizes different plans, helping users choose the best option. Administrators can also monitor the popularity and performance of each plan.
The Services module manages all the services provided by the agency. It includes detailed descriptions, pricing, availability, and specific requirements or conditions for each service. Administrators can add new services, update existing details, and remove services no longer offered. This module categorizes services into different groups for easier user navigation and access.

Enquiry NowUsers & Transactions









The All Users module keeps track of everyone registered on the website. It stores details such as names, contact information, when they registered, and what subscriptions they have. Administrators can manage these profiles by adding new users, updating existing ones, or removing users. This module also logs what users do on the site.
The Transaction module records every financial transaction on the website. It logs payments, refunds, and other financial activities, noting details like transaction IDs, dates, amounts, payment methods, and statuses. This helps ensure all financial records are clear and accurate, aiding in financial report generation for administrators.











Let's Start
